name: wired-paywall
title: WIRED Paywall
subtitle: Make the readers pay for it
synopsis:
I was the lead product engineer at *WIRED* for the site's paywall project across the entire stack. This involved collaboration across many teams at Cond√© Nast and beyond to ensure a smooth launch for this massive product shift.

This work included integrating a third party tracking service, [Evolok](https://www.evolok.com/), with client side user data all on the Fastly edge server.

Since *WIRED* gets millions of visits, ensuring the entire project scaled and cached correctly was a difficult but inspiring challenge.
